attributes.action: Contact the President of United States of America, Barrack Obama and the United Nations, ask them to intervene immediately to stop this kind of punishment in all the countries that practise it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BBC reports, "A 20-year-old woman divorcee accused of committing adultery in Somalia has been stoned to death by Islamists in front of a crowd of about 200 people.

A judge working for the militant group al-Shabab said she had had an affair with an unmarried 29-year-old man. 

He said she gave birth to a still-born baby and was found guilty of adultery. Her boyfriend was given 100 lashes."

This article is disturbing. How many more people should endure such treatment before the world acts?

All Human Beings where ever they are deserve to be treated fairly, equally, with respect and dignity.
